content: {"name": "Zion Lutheran Church Feed Your Neighbor Program", "alternate_name": "", "description": "**Serves: 43560**\n\nRequired: Photo ID, proof of address (such as a current utility bill), and verification for each household member (Medicaid card or Social Security card)", "email": "", "url": "https://www.zionlutheranottawalakemi.com/ministries/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "8307 Memorial Highway", "address_2": null, "city": "Ottawa Lake", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "49267", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 41.7633828, "longitude": -83.7477619}, "phones": [{"number": "(734) 856-2921", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Social Security Card Required"}]}
